data.message:
Dear Em, I wrote u, but u still aint textin
left my cell, my email and my home phone at the bottom
I sent 2 tweets back in autumn
U must notve got em
There prob was a problem with the server or somethin
Ticket site for summer sessions took my money
Wife got them for my 40th, she's a honey
Turns out that fake site did fuk us over 
Man it hurt
Now we be left out and can't get to your concert
Hope u are all good and the gig is wicked
I'm gutted my 40th won't go as predicted 
Truly yours
Your biggest fan
Doogz

Hope to get the chance to see you again!🤞🏼🤞🏼🤞🏼🤞🏼
